long_description: ginebra san miguel inc. (gsmi) proudly continues flagship brand ginebra san miguel's heritage of excellence, maintaining its position as a market leader in distilled spirits. gsmi is dedicated to offering its consumers only the finest in distilled spirits, from the prestigious ginebra san miguel, to new and exciting products that cater to modern tastes. gsmi's success into the 21st century. whether you're out with your closest friends or sharing a table with strangers on a casual friday night, every moment is a celebration with ginebra. our barangay is a community where hearts unite and bonds grow stronger. we are looking for individuals with fresh ideas and a profound appreciation of tradition to help continue gsmi's success into the 21st century. to our subsidiaries and smc subsidiaries and affiliates.
